description: Try our easy to follow Thai-style Coconut Mussels recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai-style Coconut Mussels Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the liquid to a vigorous boil and boil rapidly for 5 minutes or until reduced. Strain through a fine sieve, then ladle over the mussels. Garnish with chopped red chilli, chopped coriander leaves and lemon grass stalks.
